description.value: Your hands move with uncanny sureness, dismantling danger. When you attempt an Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grab an Edge], you can spend a Mythic Point to attempt the check at mythic proficiency. You can expend a Mythic Point when attempting to Disable a Device to attempt the check at mythic proficiency. As normal when attempting a check with mythic proficiency, this allows you to attempt to Disable a Device even if the check normally requires expert or greater proficiency.
